content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

select * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursegopidl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)AS [result]; 


--check data types
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'select * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursegopidl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv'',
    FORMAT = ''csv'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS [result]'


--check the max length of columns
select 
MAX(LEN(day_name)) as len_day_name,
MAX(LEN(month_name)) as len_month_name
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursegopidl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as [result];


--with column names provided
select * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    date_key  BIGINT 1,
    date DATE 2,
    year  BIGINT 3,
    month  BIGINT 4,
    day  BIGINT 5,
    day_name  VARCHAR(10) 6,
    day_of_year  BIGINT 7,
    month_of_year  BIGINT 8,
    week_of_year  BIGINT 9,
    month_name  VARCHAR(10) 10,
    year_month  BIGINT 11,
    year_week  BIGINT 12
)AS [result];
